duties_responsibilities.duty: Overseeing the credit granting process and conducting periodic reviews of creditworthiness.
Developing and executing business plans ensuring alignment with corporate strategic plan.
Establishing and managing administrative and review systems and procedures to protect the quality and profitability of the portfolio.
Analyzing, underwriting, and approving/disapproving credit line requests.
Identifying potential problem credit accounts and working with internal staff to minimize risk for loss.
Advising staff, officers, and/or business units on the company's overall Credit policies.
Defining credit management policies and controls and establishing credit limits.
Providing management and oversight of credit management activities and authorizing credit exceptions.
Establishing metrics to provide up-to-date data to make informed decisions.
Working with management, Sales, and Program Management to monitor AR status and customer credit issues.
Supporting collections team and assessing credit risk.
Acting as the point of contact for all matters relating to credit management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree with 10+ years' work experience in credit control and credit control and analysis.
Hands-on experience developing and implementing revised credit control processes, policies, and reporting.
Ability to initiate and implement change in a fast-paced environment.
Strong results orientation with a track record of meeting or exceeding business objectives.
Excellent interpersonal skills and ability to interact successfully with all levels of management.
Excellent skills in Microsoft Excel and PowerPoint.
High level of integrity and dependability with a strong sense of urgency.
Fully applies oneself to the requirements of the position.
